recursive subroutine util(arr, n, ops, idx)
  use global_vars
  implicit none
  integer(8), intent(in) :: arr(4)
  integer, intent(in) :: n
  character(len=1), dimension(3), intent(in) :: ops
  integer, intent(in) :: idx
  integer(8) :: temp_arr(4)
  integer :: temp_size, i, j, k, counter
  integer(8) :: res

  if (idx == 3) then
    current_min = min(current_min, arr(1)) return
  end if

module global_vars

recursive subroutine util(arr, n, ops, idx)
  use global_vars
  implicit none
  integer(8), intent(in) :: arr(4)
  integer, intent(in) :: n
  character(len=1), dimension(3), intent(in) :: ops
  integer, intent(in) :: idx
  integer(8) :: temp_arr(4)
  integer :: temp_size, i, j, k, counter
  integer(8) :: res

  if (idx == 3) then
    current_min = min(current_min, arr(1))
    return
  end if

  do i = 1, n -1
    do j = i +1, n
      temp_size = n -1
      temp_arr = 0  ! Initialize to zeros, but not necessary?
      counter = 1

      do k = 1, n
        if (k /= i .and. k /=j) then 
          temp_arr(counter) = arr(k)
          counter = counter +1
        end if
      end do

      if (idx <3 .and. ops(idx + 1) == '+') then
        res = arr(i) + arr(j)
      else
        res = arr(i) * arr(j)
      end if

      temp_arr(counter) = res

      call util(temp_arr, temp_size, ops, idx+1)
    end do
  end do

  return
end subroutine util
